alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 8:20PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sedgwick and northwestern Sumner Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 820 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Viola, or 6 miles southeast of Cheney, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Colwich, Garden Plain, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Andale, Eastborough and Viola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 21. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 32 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Kansas.
